name: The Space Station (Among Us) Map
description:
Install instructions

Check out my video on How to install the space station in among us !

OR

Download the zip file !

Then extract it.

Move all files in the extracted file to your among us folder.

Then Start Playing !

NOTE : - 

When you first launch the "Among  Us .exe " file it may take a few minutes to load.  but don't care about it. Next time it will be faster than before.
